summary:
CupOfTea - Your go-to solution for deploying Solana tokens quickly and effortlessly. CupOfTea is designed to make token creation a breeze, offering user-friendly features and customization options.

 About - Your go-to solution for deploying Solana tokens quickly and effortlessly. CupOfTea is designed to make token creation a breeze, offering user-friendly features and customization options.

 Features - Easy-to-use interface for seamless token deployment. Add liquidity directly from the bot. Affordable deployment cost of just 1 SOL. Customize taxonomies to suit your project. Set your own token image for a personalized touch.

 About the Bot - CupOfTea is a Telegram bot dedicated to simplifying the Solana token deployment process. Whether you're a seasoned developer or new to the crypto space, our bot ensures a smooth and quick token creation experience. Take control of your project with CupOfTea!
